title: "Electronics"

Circuit Diagrams and parts list.

```{mermaid}
flowchart LR

    %%State Machine and Valve Controllers
    SM[Bpod Finite State Machine] --> VCL[Valve Controller L]
    SM --> VCR[Valve Controller R]
    SM --> VCI[Valve Controller I]
    SM --> FVL[Final Valve Left]
    SM --> FVR[Final Valve Right]

    %% Water Valves
    VCI[Valve Controller I] --> PVI[Water Valve Init.]
    VCL[Valve Controller L] --> PVL[Water Valve Left]
    VCR[Valve Controller R] --> PVR[Water Valve Right]

    %% Pokes
    IRI[Beam Break I] --> VCI
    IRL[Beam Break L] --> VCL
    IRR[Beam Break R] --> VCR

    SM --> OFL[Olfactometer L]
    SM --> OFR[Olfactometer R]
    OFL --> FVL
    OFR --> FVR
    
    %% NiDAQ Poke
    IRI --> NDP[NiDAQ_poke]
    IRL --> NDP
    IRR --> NDP

    %% NiDAQ Sniff
    SNF[Thermistor] --> NDS[NiDAQ_sniff]
    CAM[Camera] --> NDS
    FVL --> NDS
    FVR --> NDS

```
